dead_ends.action: Force-deleting the namespace with kubectl delete ns --force --grace-period=0
dead_ends.why_fails: Does not work for stuck Terminating namespaces; finalizers still block

dead_ends.action: Waiting indefinitely for it to resolve
dead_ends.why_fails: May never resolve if the finalizer controller is gone

workarounds.action: Remove the finalizer: kubectl get ns <ns> -o json | jq '.spec.finalizers = []' | kubectl replace --raw /api/v1/namespaces/<ns>/finalize -f -
workarounds.how: Clears the stuck finalizer allowing deletion to proceed

workarounds.action: Check what's preventing deletion: kubectl api-resources --verbs=list --namespaced -o name | xargs -n1 kubectl get -n <ns>
workarounds.how: Lists all remaining resources in the namespace that may block deletion
